General.Name: Hangzhou Cable
General.Description: Hangzhou Cable Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wires, cables, and optical fiber cables in China and internationally. The company's products include high voltage, power, overhead, control, mineral insulation, mining, wind power, rail transit, fireproof, and rubber cables, as well as aluminum alloy, overhead, and plastic wires. It also offers steel-reinforced aluminum stranded wires, aluminum alloy conductors, aluminum-clad steel conductors, and other products. Hangzhou Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Lie Sheng  Yang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
